<!-- Autogenerated by mlir-tblgen; don't manually edit -->

### `-convert-gradient-to-llvm`

_Perform a dialect conversion from Gradient to LLVM_

#### Options

```
-use-generic-functions : Use generic allocation and deallocation functions instead of the classic 'malloc', 'aligned_alloc' and 'free' functions
```

### `-gradient-postprocess`

_Make the signatures of ForwardOp and ReverseOp compatibleto Enzyme._

### `-gradient-preprocess`

_Insert Func.CallOp for ForwardOp and ReverseOp._

### `-lower-gradients`

_Lower operations in the gradient dialect to core MLIR dialects._
